name: Eternal Seitung Harbor Shenanigans
requirement: Successfully complete events around Seitung Harbor in Seitung Province.

bits.text: Help Ho-Sook deliver her goods to the correct recipient.
Help Chin-Hae deliver his goods to the correct recipient.
Find the toys stolen by the mischievous spirits.
Subdue Tae-Sung to protect the spirits of Zen Daijun.
Stop the extremist Speakers from binding the spirits.
Escort the ritualist to the main temple in Zen Daijun.
